tool_description: A multilingual, precise technology for HR and businesses to analyze and enrich resumes, providing in-depth profile insights.
name: Resume parser and analyzer
title: Resume parser and analyzer

api_list.name: Get data from resume by ID
api_list.description:
Here you will get a full information parsed from uploaded resume:

Here's an explanation of the provided fields:

## Root
 - `id`: unique ID of cv
 - `status`: Processing Status: `initialized`, `processing`, `succeeded`, `failed`
 - `filename`: `filename-{uuid}.pdf` of uploaded cv
 - `created_at`: timestamp of cv when it has been created
 - `updated_at`: timestamp of cv when it has been updated
 - `file_url`: url to download cv you have uploaded before
 - `person`: Parsed Data of person from CV

## Person

-  `contacts_info`: Contains primary contact-related information.
    - `emails`: The email address of the person.
    - `telegram`: The Telegram handle of the person.
    - `github`: The GitHub handle of the person.
    - `phones`: The phone number of the person.
-  `skills`: An array listing the skills that the person has.
-  `id`: The unique identification string of the person.
-  `experience`: An array of previous job experience(s), with each experience represented as an object containing details pertaining to the job
-  `does_end_date_anywhere_stated`: Indicates if an end date is mentioned in any of the job experiences.
-  `orig_proficiency`: Proficiencies in languages mentioned in their original format.
-  `about_me`: Description of the person.
-  `birthday_date`: Birth date of the person.
-  `names`: Name of the person.
-  `orig_skills`: Original list of skills without any modifications.
-  `real_age`: The real age of the person.
-  `created_at`: The timestamp when this entry was created.
-  `courses`: An array of the courses attended by the person with each course represented as an object.
-  `institutions`: An array of educational institutions that the person has attended with each institution represented as an object.
-  `proficiency`: Proficiencies in languages.
-  `languages`: Languages the person can speak.
-  `experience_overall_time_month`: The total experience of the person in terms of months.
-  `orig_about_me`: Original description about the person without any modifications.

## Experience Subfields

-  `legal_suffix`: Legal form of the organization.
-  `job_title`: Title of the job.
-  `orig_job_title`: Original title of the job in its unmodified form.
-  `overall_time_month`: Total duration of the job in months.
-  `start_date`: Start date of the job.
-  `orig_description`: Original description of the job.
-  `abilities`: Skills or abilities used or required in the job.
-  `end_date`: End date of the job.
-  `competencies_cluster`: Computed competencies cluster for the job.
-  `is_description_orig_short`: Flag indicating if the original description was short.
-  `tools`: Tools used in the job.
-  `project_description`: Description of the project(s) done in the job.
-  `orig_company_name`: Original name of the company in its unmodified form.
-  `responsibilities`: List of responsibilities in the job.
-  `root_cluster`: Root cluster classification of the job.
-  `is_tools_non_specific`: Flag indicating if the tools used are nonspecific.
-  `knowledge`: Knowledge used or gained from the job.
-  `company_name`: Name of the company.
-  `end_of_description`: Last sentence or concluding remark from the description.
-  `orig_responsibilities`: Original responsibilities in the job in its unmodified form.
-  `clear_company_name`: Cleaned company name without any unnecessary characters.
-  `orig_achievements`: Any achievements in the job in its original, unmodified form.
-  `achievements`: Any achievements in the job.
-  `job_grade`: Job grade or level, if applicable.
-  `start_of_description`: First sentence or introductory remark from the description.
-  `until_now`: Flag indicating if the job is current.

## Courses Subfields

-  `start_date`: Start date of the course.
-  `until_now`: Flag indicating if the course is ongoing.
-  `course_provider`: The provider of the course(institution/organization).
-  `end_date`: End date of the course.
-  `orig_course_provider`: Name of the original course provider in its unmodified form.
-  `orig_education_field`: Original course name/field in its unmodified form.
-  `education_field`: Name/field of the course.

## Institutions Subfields

-  `start_date`: Start date at the institution.
-  `until_now`: Flag indicating if the person is currently associated with the institution.
-  `transcript_university_name`: Transcribed name of the university.
-  `education_field`: Field of education/study.
-  `end_date`: End date at the institution.
-  `university_name`: Name of the university.
-  `orig_education_field`: Original field of education/study in its unmodified form.
-  `orig_university_name`: Original name of the university in its unmodified form.

required_parameters.name: cv_id
required_parameters.description:
Unique ID of a resume. By this ID you can use this endpoint to get a full information parsed from uploaded file.
When you have uploaded file using another endpoint, you'll get in response this ID.
Alternatively, you can always send a request to get a list of uploaded resumes, which also includes IDs.

api_list.name: Get list of resumes
api_list.description:
This endpoint will return to you information about all uploaded resumes.
Each resume has the following fields:
 - `id`: you will use it to get a full resume information later
 - `filename`: the uploaded filename + uuid to make the filenames unique
 - `status`: the processing status of resume
 - `created_at`: when the file has been uploaded
 - `updated_at`: when the file has been analyzed

optional_parameters.name: status
optional_parameters.description:
- `initialized`: It means you have uploaded a resume for analysis.
- `processing`: Your resume is being processed now.
- `succeeded`: Your resume is successfully analyzed.
- `failed`: The resume analysis has failed.

schema.title: Response Get Cv List Api V1 Cv  Get
